title: Weather Forecast
content:
Weak monsoon currents are penetrating upper parts of the country.
Mainly hot and very humid weather is expected in most plain areas of the country. However, rain-wind-thundershower is expected at isolated places in Kashmir, upper Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and northeast Punjab.
Mainly hot and very humid weather is expected in most plain areas of the country. However, rain-wind-thundershower is expected at isolated places in Kashmir, upper Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, northeast Punjab and Gilgit Baltistan.
Hot and humid weather prevailed over most parts of the country. However, rain occurred at a few places in upper Khyber Pakthunkhwa.
Rainfall(mm): Saidu Sharif 05, Malam Jabba 04 and upper Dir 02.
Yesterday’s highest maximum Temperature’s (°C): Dadu 44, Sibbi 43.
Source: Pakistan Meteorological Department
